name: Bagu Bagu
description:
Koi-Koi is a classic Japanese card game. Bagu Bagu is the same game, but we swapped out the cards for bugs!

Bagu Bagu is all about getting the most points, after a number of rounds, by matching bugs to achieve specific "combos" of varying difficulties and value.

Bagu Bagu has a single player mode with tutorial, and 3 varying difficulty levels, as well as support for multiplayer. In particular, it has Discord integration, which allows you to share a hosted lobby straight into the chat for others to join!

You can join the official Discord here.
